#summary UCSB Create + Kinect Robot

== UCSB Robotics Lab Create + Kinect Platform ==
For the most part we followed [http://www.ros.org/wiki/kinect/Tutorials/Adding%20a%20Kinect%20to%20an%20iRobot%20Create this] tutorial.  Instead of a linear regulator we used a switching regulator module, [http://focus.ti.com/docs/prod/folders/print/78sr112.html 78SR112HC] purchased from [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=78SR112HC-ND DigiKey].
